name: Tractor Beam (itch)
description: Save the dinosaurs one asteroid at a time in your space-ship-time-machine! Drag asteroids off their collision course with Earth using your tractor beam. Your tractor beam has two targeting modes, press Z to target the highlighted asteroid that you are facing, or X to target the closest asteroid. See how many asteroids you can deflect before realising it is a hopeless endeavour!
